title: Comparative Analysis of Biological Circuit Design and Machine Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic biology and machine learning concepts comprehension
context.additional_context: Mobile-optimized microlearning for current professionals, with project-based assessments verifying practical application skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain environmental problem-solving mechanisms by comparing the design principles of biological circuits and machine learning models.
Learners can analyze the learning mechanisms of biological circuits from an evolutionary perspective and connect them to machine learning techniques.
Learners can research biological applications of randomly connected network models and propose design solutions applicable to real-world problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
